verses.verse: O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you are my <S%H430>God;<s%> I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> you, I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name;<s%> for you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6382>wonderful<s%> things; your <S%H6098>counsels<s%> of <S%H7350>old<s%> are <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and <S%H544>truth.<s%>

For you have <S%H7760>made<s%> of a <S%H5892>city<s%> an <S%H1530>heap;<s%> of a <S%H1219>defended<s%> <S%H7151>city<s%> a <S%H4654>ruin:<s%> a <S%H759>palace<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%> to be no <S%H5892>city;<s%> it shall <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1129>built.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3513>glorify<s%> you, the <S%H7151>city<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> you.

For you have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H4581>strength<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> a <S%H4581>strength<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%> in his <S%H6862>distress,<s%> a <S%H4268>refuge<s%> from the <S%H2230>storm,<s%> a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> from the <S%H2721>heat,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> ones is as a <S%H2230>storm<s%> against the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

You shall <S%H3665>bring<s%> <S%H3665>down<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers,<s%> as the <S%H2721>heat<s%> in a <S%H6724>dry<s%> place; even the <S%H2721>heat<s%> with the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of a <S%H5645>cloud:<s%> the <S%H2159>branch<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> ones shall be <S%H6030>brought<s%> <S%H6030>low.<s%>

And in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of <S%H8081>fat<s%> things, a <S%H4960>feast<s%> of <S%H8105>wines<s%> on the <S%H8105>lees,<s%> of <S%H8081>fat<s%> things full of <S%H4229>marrow,<s%> of <S%H8105>wines<s%> on the <S%H8105>lees<s%> well <S%H2212>refined.<s%>

And he will <S%H1104>destroy<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3875>covering<s%> <S%H3874>cast<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H4541>veil<s%> that is <S%H5259>spread<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

He will <S%H1104>swallow<s%> up <S%H4194>death<s%> in <S%H5331>victory;<s%> and the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> will <S%H4229>wipe<s%> away <S%H1832>tears<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces;<s%> and the <S%H2781>rebuke<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%> shall he <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

And it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is our <S%H430>God;<s%> we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for him, and he will <S%H3467>save<s%> us: <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> we have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for him, we will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

For in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H1758>trodden<s%> down <S%H8478>under<s%> him, even as <S%H4963>straw<s%> is <S%H1758>trodden<s%> down for the <S%H4087>dunghill.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6566>spread<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of them, as he that <S%H7811>swims<s%> <S%H6566>spreads<s%> forth his hands to <S%H7811>swim:<s%> and he shall <S%H8213>bring<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> their <S%H1346>pride<s%> together with the <S%H698>spoils<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And the <S%H4013>fortress<s%> of the <S%H4869>high<s%> <S%H4869>fort<s%> of your <S%H2346>walls<s%> shall he <S%H7817>bring<s%> <S%H7817>down,<s%> lay <S%H8213>low,<s%> and <S%H5060>bring<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> even to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
